Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:45.63]Sometimes it feels like my life's a battle
[00:49.26]And I think I'm losing my mind
[00:52.84]When all that surrounds me is made of shadows
[01:00.58]If I'm just a lost soul that's made of paper
[01:04.15]But your touch can color the white
[01:08.08]And bring back the beauty into my life
[01:14.57]'Cause it's a mad world but it's crazy
[01:20.45]Crazy how you make the bad turn to amazing
[01:27.87]And I don't want to lose this now
[01:31.92]I don't want to lose this now
[01:35.27]No, I don't want to lose this now
[01:40.98]'Cause it's a mad world
[02:23.10]Were both strangers finding our way together
[02:26.85]Like two lights that dance through the dark
[02:30.55]We shine bright and fade out into forever
[02:38.18]And I'm trying to hold back the way I'm feeling
[02:41.60]But you make me come back to life
[02:45.48]Yeah, you've got me going insane tonight
[02:52.14]'Cause it's a mad world but it's crazy
[02:58.08]Crazy how you make the bad turn to amazing
[03:05.39]And I don't want to lose this now
[03:09.39]I don’t want to lose this now
[03:12.98]No, I don't want to lose this now
[03:18.52]'Cause it's a mad world
[03:48.52]'Cause it's a mad world
